overview: Julie Peters is a legend in the trans community in Australia. She was the first person to transition at the ABC, at a time when there were no role models around her.  From her early twenties, Julie started collecting anything trans or queer related to help her work out who she was. Over the years sheâ€™s collected one of the most comprehensive trans archives in the country. Including Interview with ABC MD David Anderson.
title: The Accidental Archivist
